properties.execute: var cleaner = setInterval(function(){ var ads = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="pop"], [id*="pop"], [class*="ads"]'); ads.forEach(el => el.remove()); var jwp = document.querySelector('.jwplayer'); if(jwp && window.jwplayer){ var player = jwplayer(); /* Forzar Play/Pause con el OK del control */ window.onkeydown = function(e) { if(e.keyCode == 13 || e.keyCode == 179) { player.getState() == 'playing' ? player.pause() : player.play(); } }; jwp.focus(); clearInterval(cleaner); } }, 1000);

var cleaner = setInterval(function(){ var ads = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="pop"], [id*="pop"], [class*="ads"]'); ads.forEach(el => el.remove()); var jwp = document.querySelector('.jwplayer'); if(jwp && window.jwplayer){ var player = jwplayer(); window.onkeydown = function(e) { if(e.keyCode == 13 || e.keyCode == 179) { player.getState() == 'playing' ? player.pause() : player.play(); } }; jwp.focus(); clearInterval(cleaner); } }, 1000);
